name: Gain Trial
description:
Inspired by the LEGO games made by Tt games, this odd game was made for Gain Jam #3 on Weight Gaming. It currently has 8 bite-sized levels and 5 different characters.

CONTROLS:
[E]-Interact/Swap with a Character
[12]-Change Character (While in a level)
[WASD]-Move
[Space]-Jump/Select menu item

Update V1.0.1
-Sounds and Music added
-You can now change characters that are walking around
-You have a companion in each level
-Some objects have been resized
-Level shakes when you land if your heavy

Post-Jam Ideas/Updates:
-More and varied characters
-More mechanics (micro/macro, strength, swimming, flight, etc)
-Custom Imports (Make your own character)
-A Storyline/Plot
-Shop and Unlockable characters
-In-game Achievements
